objects.text:
• ABSORBS OIL INSTANTLY
• REDUCES PORES & ACNE
• HYDRATES WITHOUT HEAVINESS
• NATURAL INGREDIENTS

product_details.description: ABSORBS OIL AND CONTROLS SHINE INSTANTLY— You never again have to be embarrassed by shiny, oily skin. This formula has silica, which immediately absorbs excess oil and diffuses light, leaving a natural matte finish on your face or bald head. REDUCES ACNE, BLACKHEADS, AND LARGE PORES — Sweet orange peel extract unclogs skin, leaving pores free of the gunk that causes blackheads and breakouts. Pores shrink to normal size and are less visible. Silica also helps remove toxins. HYDRATES WITHOUT HEAVINESS — Citronella extract softens and glycerin locks in moisture, leaving skin hydrated without being greasy or heavy. Skin becomes balanced; especially good for combination skin where you have oily and dry patches. An outstanding makeup primer. FREE OF ALL THE BAD STUFF — The last thing your skin needs is gunk. That’s why Instant Fix Oil Control is free of parabens, phthalates, GMOs, DEA, and triclosan. It’s also allergy and dermatologist tested, and made cruelty free in the USA. FAVORITE WITH GROOMING EXPERTS— Anthony brand men’s grooming products have been featured (and won awards) in top publications, including Men’s Health, New York Times, Forbes, GQ, and Esquire. We’re also in 850 high-end barber shops across US and Canada. Brand - Anthony ** Item Volume - 90 Milliliters ** Item dimensions L x W x H - 1.69 x 1.06 x 5.79 inches ** Age Range (Description) - Adult ** Special Feature - Not Tested On Animals, Hypoallergenic, Natural Ingredients **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium skincare product against a modern, dark-themed background. It utilizes bold and high-contrast typography to emphasize key messages. The primary title (`heading`) is large and white, drawing attention to the main selling point, while the supporting subtitle (`subheading`) uses a vibrant orange to highlight product benefits. A concise bulleted list (`description`) outlines notable features in white for easy readability. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed on the right side to maintain visual balance. The price (`price`) is displayed boldly to attract conversions, followed by a noticeable call-to-action (`cta`, `cta_background`) in an orange rounded button.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Black: `#212121`
- Dark Grey Blocks: `#1A1A1A`, `#262626`, `#333333`
- Headline White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Orange: `#D65A31`
- Light Grey Detail Fonts: `#444444`
product_color: The product image uses a minimalistic and bold color palette to convey professionalism, clarity, and masculinity. Dominated by matte black (#1A1A1A) and light grey (#E6E6E6), the packaging creates a strong contrast that draws immediate attention. White (#FFFFFF) is used for key information, maintaining readability. Accents of vibrant red (#D1342C) strategically highlight words like “Objective” and “Strategy,” adding urgency and directing focus. A softer charcoal gray (#4D4D4D) supports secondary information. The brand name “Anthony” blends white and red, standing out against black and reinforcing brand identity. These tones blend seamlessly while contrasting enough to remain visually distinct and engaging.
